item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Night Meetup series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in Providence.

This week's location is: Shula's 347 in the Providence Hilton

This week we're joining the AIGA RI and Val for an evening at Shula's 347 Grill in the Providence Hilton! Whether you care about what going on in the design world or not, either way its a great way to spend an evening AND we haven't been here yet! So, come on down, get a little design-educated if you want, and let's check it out!

if you want to know more about the AIGA event click here: http://ri.aiga.org/ev...

Hope to see you there!

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.
Ever.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing a silver scarf, but we're hard to miss!
item.name: Monday Night Meetup - Shula's 347 in the Providence Hilton!
